title: Charging Issue with my Pixel 3XL
content:
The device can only be charged when it is turned off.
I tried safe mode, hard reboot and factory reset. I even tried cleaning the USB port.
Oddly enough, it still works with headphones.
I tried to contact Google for warranty claim but ended in a loop redirecting me to the help center main page...
Do they still have a support team for their products?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3a XL
